title: 这是什么报错呀！服务端无限重启！
author: xxx小盆友
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Oh - I know what I did wrong!

Time: 20-2-27 下午2:47
Description: Exception in server tick loop

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/client/entity/EntityClientPlayerMP

replies.author: 帕帕武
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 帕帕武 于 2020-2-27 15:05 编辑 

UCHE alluwant {2.1} [全部想要]（All-U-Want 2.1.jar）

背包编辑器出问题了，删除就行，服务端不必安装

replies.author: Qwe_Sakura
replies.txt_content: 删除AE 林业 热力膨胀 ThermalFoundation
